title: #2【バイオハザードre4】はじめてのバイオハザードre4やるにぇえええええええ！！！※未成年視聴注意【ホロライブ/さくらみこ】
name: Sakura Miko

entries.text: I'll never understand that part for the rest of my life.
I wasn't being cunning with the scope!
Could you please stop saying such rude things?
As for the story so far...
The police officer who went to take a pee...
To save the target, the blonde girl...
We came all the way to the church.
But in the meantime, by some guy who looked like a cult leader...
We were injected with something, having a pillar-like thing shot into us.
That's what happened. But mostly, everyone probably just remembers me getting caught in bear traps and screaming.
Wait, isn't there a digest? A digest...
I wonder if someone made a digest clip? Wait a second.
This series is funny, after all. You know...
Watching from the middle is kinda tough, right? From the middle...
So a recap is necessary, you see.
Let's review Miko-chan's RE4 up to last time.
Alright, let's watch this clip from Nenene-san.
I'm saying the same things first.
I'm blowing away the ones getting panicked here.
I was surprised to see a clip of Miko-chan falling right into that trap.
Something happened, I saw it on X.
Sakura Miko-rin Bazard up until last time.
Apparently, the new items you get from records are in the extra content shop.
This time, it's Chapter 3, around the church, crossing the lake.
We ended just before that, so I'll be crossing the lake this time.
I'll be asking everyone for help again this time.
Everyone, please give Miko-chan advice when she asks.
I wanted to read that just now!
That was the most important part!
The light is on here too.
I want to become able to use these flash grenades properly.
Eh, wait, isn't the lake incredibly huge?
Map... I don't know my current location.
So, I can't enter the church right now, but she's inside it.
"Retrieve the key from outside... something something... until further orders."
"The key is across the lake." So...
Inside a cave on the opposite shore of the lake.
Look for a way to infiltrate.
The key is in a cave. That's the gist.
Ah, wait, I didn't look at this.
But wait, I want to see that ladder from before too.
Can I check the top of the ladder?
The regular route feels like the underground, but...
There might be something up here too.
That's the voice of someone inside the church.
Huh, I feel like I reached this point before.
So it was the door next to this path. I see, it's a shortcut.
I knew it. Somewhere... First, one guy.
Wait a sec, wait a sec. This guy has a long weapon.
Did the guy who fell down die?
Since I'm home, it was reversed every time.
It's not broken, I can still go.
The ones I picked up are fine, I'll take them.
The days at the factory are paying off.
Does this mean if I loop around I can go down?
Can I do something like this?
The wooden path seems like the regular route.
I want to make rifle ammo but...
Is it okay to make rifle ammo?
Vipers take up a lot of space, you know.
Want to get it soon though.
You know, yesterday at the altar there was a big head.
I said "Is it a giant?" but isn't this it?
Crap, please come one by one. I beg you.
At the Quarry and Fish Farm.
More importantly, isn't this open space scary?
It has a "we're gonna fight" atmosphere, everyone.
Miko-Leon is getting a bit scared.
Haven't you been hearing snorting sounds?
I hear really loud breathing from that door.
Dads breathe like that when they sleep, right?
Can you see? In the Quarry.
That means there are no more here.
Vipers... if only I could catch one more.
"Instead of leaving unused weapons, selling them and modifying others is much better."
"When you sell a weapon, most of the upgrade cost is returned."
"This is purely a service of goodwill. I expect great things from you."
Oh, Grave Robber. Spinel, okay, okay.
Maybe I should save up for the Laser Pointer.
"Modifying your favorite weapon to your liking."
Not a type I can attach, right?
"You can't take it to the grave."
Sell the snake? Eh, but snake is just one more.
Sell 3... so if I get one more, I get Spinels, right?
Then, I won't sell the Combat Knife.
"No matter how valuable, you can't take it to the grave." "Is there anything else?" "Truly skilled arms."
Not here yet? 20% off Bolt Thrower.
"I promise." "Fires bolts excellent for noise suppression."
"Fired bolts can be retrieved." Ah, bolts are those...
Bolts. Are bolts good? Eh, 3 gunpowders.
Rocket Launcher is 100k per shot?! Ehhhhh?! Rocket Launcher is that much?!
Buying it would be nice, but... Rocket Launcher is one-use so it's whatever.
Seriously? I wanted to use the Rocket Launcher though.
"Preparedness is key." Let's consume this Hand Grenade.
Lake is far. Ah, but this is water. Can I go to the lake?
The habit of looking at people. That's what's important, isn't it?
Oh, it's becoming Pirates of the Caribbean.
Don't shoot the sailors, got it.
Miko-chan's aim is a bit trash, is that okay?
Defeat pirates and aim for a high score!
Weapons and ammo are unlimited use.
Use tokens at the Token Machine to get Charms. Treasures you can only get here.
Shoot dynamite to destroy surrounding targets at once. Caution: Shooting the sailor is a penalty.
Some targets won't break with one shot. Blast them until they break.
Meeting certain conditions adds targets. Conditions change by game.
Ehh, looks kinda fun. But what is this? Gacha-gacha?
Token Machine. 3 Silver or Gold tokens for one Charm lottery. More Gold tokens mean rarer Charms.
What's a Charm? The only customer is Miko, definitely.
Then, shall Red Miko-san do this? Shall Red Miko-san give it a go?
First, let's try with a handgun.
Isn't it precision? Not reticle speed?
Where do I do this speed?
Let's try this one more time.
Uwa, wait, let me try again and get tokens.
The dynamite the yellow uncle is holding...
Just go "Pow" and it's fine, right?
This will be the last one.
If I can't do it this time, I'll give up and go somewhere else.
Doing it so seriously to complete this, Miko...
Was this place just for that?
I'm glad Miko-chan is having fun. Sorry, the story hasn't progressed. I get absorbed. Miko-Leon.
Wait, just unloaded? Gonna peek? They're talking.
"Retrieve only the necessary amount from the processing plant deep in the Fish Farm."
Well, I have ammo, so it's fine.
Or does it mean I have to ride the boat?
Put some fuel in at least! No fuel so I can't go.
I've gathered quite a bit of healing items!
Then let's go get the fuel.
Isn't now the time for this Hand Grenade?
It's a horror game staple, but...
If you pull the trigger, something happens.
Just now, definitely gave the middle finger.
Should I repair the knife before going?
Let's go back for a bit.
Slow and steady wins the race.
Ah right, I got Medallions too.
Everyone thinks I should exchange for the Laser Pointer.
"Junk or whatever, welcome. Though we decide the value."
Yellow Diamond is 7000 yen each, so getting 3 means...
"If only it was always like this."
"If you think so, modify your weapon." Should I increase Shotgun power?
It was a bit weak earlier. Can I attach the Laser thing?
Don't have that many Lasers yet.
Power Up is better. Shotgun... possibility of selling Shotgun.
True, then can I sell it? If I sell, I increase power... "Captivated?"
"Our craftsmanship is art." "Load two rounds at once."
"Don't forget knife maintenance. It's a moment to sharpen your spirit."
"A fitting reward for splendid work. Come again."
I could read it. I can read, but...
I decided not to turn my back on Merchant-san anymore. I planned to do this after attaching it.
I can't put ginger in that.
Everyone says "Save, save." From now on...
Now I can ride the boat.
If I get hit, the boat takes damage.
The boat takes more than 1 point of damage.
No, I'm trying to hit it!
It looks just like Miko-Leon's blood.
Does this mean everyone's stream didn't drag on this long?
Might not have talent for fishing.
"We dwelling in blood are the sacred body."
"At dawn, the body will become our brethren..."
Even though we didn't rest for 3 hours.
"Ah, no problem. Sorry to worry you." "Did you enter the church?" "Not yet. Searching for the key."
Thank god. It's not like there's nothing. Chapter 4 isn't nothing.
Can't use the boat anymore. Became bait once.
"Police Hat"... That's the first cop's hat. Hand Grenade.
Umm, what was his name? That guy.
Let's check the files at times like this.
Anyway, said something about the key being in a cave.
Should I head to the cave from here?
I have lots of Handgun ammo left.
What is this complex maze-like place?
People in the middle of coupling?
Does that mean they became Migi?
In this case, I don't want to become a Neck.
If I have to fight Necks from here on...
Is this the key? Is this a key?
There was a mural... Mural Point.
If I don't move Shiragaki's hand...
The round thing to place on it...
Means I have to search for it.
The thing that was at the altar-like place?
Wait, don't tell me it comes out again.
Eh wait, there's a lot to collect.
Hmm, better to use this than this?
Is that it? Firepower focused Handgun is here.
This is a firepower focused Handgun? Then let's use this.
Ah, but ammo capacity is different. Here is this...
But I can't pick it all up.
What was the weak bow and arrow?
Are you saying this place blasphemed?
Sorry to the person who thought up the puzzle.
Lies, everyone! There was one, right?
Even if there are forgotten items...
Treasure hunting is always with everyone.
No more, right? No more, right?
Is that proof something is there?
Being able to apologize is proof of a strong adult.
No more, right everyone? No more.
No more... Making a slightly guilty face.
This... or does it mean go back? Can I get the thing here now?
Ah, can I get the Antique Pipe?
No, but it's a place with items.
"My daughter died soon after giving birth to a boy."
"Before long, he started coming along on hunts."
"If I look away, he disappears, so I can't relax."
"Seems to especially like the Tale of the Knight."
"Still small, but this child is clever."
"If not for these circumstances, he could have become a scholar."
"I definitely shot through that wolf's head."
"Returned to the hut, but the wound is swollen black and red."
"Can't move my body as I wish."
So getting bitten really infects you.
I'm curious about the girl too.
But the child in the photo earlier...
Is the old man Arturo? Maybe a girl. Looks like a girl.
Hair tied back? It's a boy, right?
Looks like a boy. Well, can't tell.
One here too. Crap, gotta be careful with inventory space.
Can I enter? I can enter now.
"Won't you catch the giant fish living in the lake?"
"Fish oil is useful for various things."
No, I shouldn't say poor things. You remembered well.
Said there were missing persons at the start. Right right right. Remembered that.
The dog the old man killed? Pep's doing it. Not yet.
World is getting tougher. Persistent. That's how it was. Digging this.
Well, managed to survive. Cut here.
Okay with item slots. Egg, certainly recover with egg.
Hey, where is the Giant Fish? There's an item too.
Why does everyone know so much?
Huh? Was there a place like this?
But there must be some hint.
But usually, if Miko was a game creature...
I'd stick to a huge tree.
Summer vacation like this is fun, but...
Can't tell what's up or down! Even if I do it blindly.
Isn't matching the patterns hard? Light blue and light blue must go together.
How to move this... Crap, this...
Requires endurance. It's become an endurance stream.
Feel like it got totally messy now. Crap, feel like it got unbelievably messy.
Have to bring it to the middle. Picture orientation doesn't matter, just complete this circle in the middle?
Wait a sec everyone. Wait a sec everyone.
Not calming down is the first mistake.
But the fixed parts haven't moved, right?
Doesn't this feel like it's almost there?
If I random mash it's no good.
This bottom left one, gotta bring it to next week somehow.
The meaning is messed up so it definitely won't work.
There was a point to giving up! (Not giving up!)
Accomplished! I can do anything and everything!
Can't throw away the Hat Key, right?
"Can attach to some rifles. 3-stage high magnification optical scope."
Should I go for the Mask with Indentations?
Let's get the Mask with Indentations.
Metal Case doesn't make it bigger?
Huh, split between Need Case and Don't Need Case factions.
Launcher is 2 million?! Can't save that much.
Want the Rocket Launcher too... But Rocket Launcher ammo...
"One-use rocket that blows away all enemies."
One use means 80k for one shot?
Uwa, Rocket Launcher is 80k a shot? Depends on use...
Maybe better to buy Rocket Launcher a bit later?
Buying it at the crucial moment before a boss is an option.
Don't know if I can buy it at the end though.
I tweaked the knife a bit.
Can I raise durability? Knife durability is max.
"Guns are fine. Knife looks sufficient." Oi.
There's a smart person. Shall I raise Red9 Power? Just one level.
Rate of fire is good too. How about max Power?
"Don't forget knife maintenance. It's a moment to sharpen your spirit."
Handgun it is. This might be better.
Uwa, which one? Red9 is that strong?
This worrying is the funniest part. No, I get it.
If asked which Miko is better at...
I use Shotgun in close range...
"Requires patience and effort. Stacking experience yields big results."
"I'll adjust it perfectly for you. Captivated by my skill?"
"Our craftsmanship is art." "Thinking seriously of surviving makes for a lovely trip."
Is this okay? Customization... Cashback is coming anyway.
What about Shotgun? It'll work out.
And this is... Three Primary Colors.
"No matter how valuable, can't take it to the grave."
"If only it was always like this."
Well, miscalculation, miscalculation. Doesn't change much.
Can take this. Let's go get this.
Oh, forgotten item. Still have forgotten items.
Have to ride the boat again.
Does it turn blue when I get everything?
Then it means all items remain?
Forgotten items all over the map.
All the dreams... There's a lot!
I have the key so that helps.
Getting all trophies is super hard.
Are you saying go all the way around?
"Good work. Now we can rescue her."
Don't know the location at all.
Eh lies, definitely still places to use it.
Want to do Yellow Diamond, honestly.
7000 times Triple Bonus is way higher.
Okay with that. Handgun... not selling?
Can I sell Handgun? Well, selling is okay.
Thought aiming with Rifle would be hard... Practically Handgun-only run though.
Gonna make you my partner for life. Amazing.
Right? When playing Outlast, looking at a defeated enemy's butt... Somehow recovered stress levels.
There is such data, Miko-chan. Then Hunting.
Where going? It's over there though.
Hurry to the church for now.
If I sell, I can't do Handgun order.
And maybe close up for today.
What's this, turn it all into stained glass?
Just need to not cover this Insignia mark?
Really, brain power is high right now, so this was easy.
Something amazing is happening right now.
There? Came. Looks like a young lady.
"Nakeru ze" (Story of my life). Here it comes. "Nakeru ze". Here it comes.
Quote came. "Listen to what I say."
Won't talk at all. Nakeru ze.
Is it hearing it from that Tell (Saddler)?
Possibility I haven't cleared it. I realized.
From a long time ago, seriously, was Biohazard 3 the first one? That level.
No, maybe that was the first but...
Or maybe ended in one slot.
If it's discontinued, I want to do it somewhere but...
Can I clear it by then? How is it?
